body: This change isâ€‚[](https://reviewable.io/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/1505)

comment_data.body: This should still be testonly. We don't want to link this into production code.
comment_data.diff_hunk:
@@ -8,8 +8,13 @@ cc_library(
 
 cc_library(
     name = "run_auto_test",
-    testonly = True,
+    srcs = ["run_auto_test.c"],

comment_data.body: Can you rename this to auto_test_support? Right now, all the "_test.c" files are actually tests. We use that fact to generate build/test rules for them. Either this, or add run_auto_test to an exclusion list below where we create those rules.

c-toxcore/auto_tests/conference_test.c:260: failed `num_frozen <= max_frozen': tox #3 has too many offline peers: 15

This started happening for me in this PR.
